details.name: ISO 14289-2:202x - 8.4.5 Fonts - 8.4.5.4 Composite fonts - WMode
details.description: For those CMaps that are embedded, the integer value of the WMode entry in the CMap dictionary shall be identical to the WMode value in the embedded CMap stream

rule.description: For those CMaps that are embedded, the integer value of the WMode entry in the CMap dictionary shall be identical to the WMode value in the embedded CMap stream
